author: Rich Cooper
title: Rich Cooper: College Class of 2024 Should Consider a Year of Community Service
description: Rather than paying tuition and suffering through online classes, incoming freshmen should consider taking a year to serve communities hard hit by coronavirus.
content:
May 1st is the day some societies celebrate May Day — when, as tradition holds, kids skip around a pole with some ribbons. Its also the day that most colleges require students to accept their offers of admission.
This coming May 1st will most likely feel mor… [+4547 chars]
